modName: Hair packs of Fallout3 Race Fix
summary: Fixed esp to make the hairs usable on all races cept khajiit and argonian.
descriptionHtml:
This is a Race fix for the mod Hair packs of Fallout 3 4845.

Requires Hair Packs of Fallout3 4845 by Radioragae.  
It can be downloaded here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17993

Fixed esp to make the hairs usable on all races cept khajiit and argonian.  This should also allow them to be used on custom races unless they are flagged as a beast race..  

just replace the original esp with this one. and the hairs should show up for those races in the race menu.

If ya find an issue with the fix lemme know and ill go thru and update the file.
author: Rendalli
